title: AI's super brain scoops up the crims
description: The Central Investigation Bureau (CIB) has launched an advanced surveillance system using artificial intelligence (AI) to identify and apprehend criminals quickly and accurately. Pol Maj Gen Sarut Kwaengsopha, CIB Deputy Commissioner, said technology once seen as science fiction is now a powerful tool for public safety.

title: 'We should kill him': AI chatbot encourages Australian man to murder his father
description: Experts are calling for new regulations on artificial intelligence chatbots, after a triple j hack investigation uncovered a disturbing example of a chatbot encouraging a man to murder his father while engaging in paedophilic role-play.

title: Artificial intelligence ushers in a golden age of hacking, experts say
description: Criminal hackers are increasingly figuring out how to turn the artificial intelligence programs on most computers against users, cybersecurity experts say.
content:
Compounding the problem is the rapid and sometimes ill-considered pace of new AI product deployments, whether by executives eager to please investors or employees on their own initiative, even in defiance of their IT departments.

title: The first AI government minister
description: FLORENCE, Italy — When Albanian Prime Minister Edi Rama recently announced his new Cabinet, it was not his choice of finance minister or foreign minister that gained the most attention. The biggest news was Rama’s appointment of an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered bot as the new minister of public procurement.
